parameters.name: FieldName
parameters.description: Name of the custom property to link or unlink

parameters.name: FieldLink
parameters.description: True to link the custom property, false to unlink it

title: ICustomPropertyManager.LinkProperty
description: Sets whether to link or unlink the specified custom property to or from its parent part.
signature:
System.Int32 LinkProperty( 
   System.String
FieldName
,
   System.Boolean
FieldLink
)

parameters.name: FieldName
parameters.description: Name of the custom property to link or unlink

parameters.name: FieldLink
parameters.description: True to link the custom property, false to unlink it

returns: Result code as defined in swCustomLinkSetResult_e
remarks: This method is valid for cut-list, feature, model, and configuration custom properties.
